translated: He will never regress from generosity, morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and wisdom.

original: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until he fully awakens to perfect buddhahood, he will never be confused.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be endowed with the reality called â€˜correct engagement with the suchness of all phenomena.â€™

original: blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be endowed with immeasurable intelligence and will be perfect.

original: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be contemplated by all the Tathagatas of the ten directions.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be followed by all the Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas.

original: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Aparajita's great dharani for perfecting the six paramitas is complete.

original: pandi ta manydzu shr'i wa rma dang / lotstsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te @340a *//
analyzed: pandi ta manydzu shr'i wa rma dang / lotstsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te @340a *//
translated: Translated, revised, and finalized by the pandita Manjushriyashas and the monk Lodan Sherab.

original: gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: gtan la phab pa /
translated: Revised and finalized.

original: lotstsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o ////
analyzed: lotstsha ba chos kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o ////
translated: Also translated and finalized by the translator Chokyi Sherab.
